column5: Wasn't very active in the years probably because he was sick. Bill died from cancer September 2.
All the best to his friends and family. He will be missed.RIP McQ
Andre, thxs for the info on McQ. He was always eager to help out and share info, especially reservoir Gouin. May he RIP.
RIP and God bless. Thankful for the tips he was able to provide me.
